.. _`picard SortSam`:

PICARD SORTSAM
==============

Sort sam/bam files using picard tools.






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule sort_bam:
        input:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam"
        output:
            "sorted/{sample}.bam"
        log:
            "logs/picard/sort_sam/{sample}.log"
        params:
            sort_order="coordinate",
            extra="VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=LENIENT" # optional: Extra arguments for picard.
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/picard/sortsam"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
